events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and appreciate your interest in our company.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department for further evaluation and next steps.
A recruiter from our engineering hiring team has been assigned to your case and will manage the communication moving forward.
You have passed the initial screening round based on your resume and experience relevant to the software engineer role.
Thank you for promptly responding to our initial screening questions and confirming your availability for further interviews.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2:00 PM with our senior software developer panel.
You have successfully completed the technical interview and demonstrated strong knowledge in software development and problem-solving.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th to discuss company culture, benefits, and your expectations.
The HR interview has been completed and you have shown alignment with the company values and role requirements.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer role including competitive salary and benefits.
You have reviewed the offer and provided positive feedback along with a few questions about the onboarding process.
You have accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you to our engineering team starting next month.
Your onboarding process has begun, including orientation and access setup for our software development tools and environment.
The hiring process is now officially closed. Congratulations on joining our engineering team and best wishes for your new role.
